H0.text: who cracked the enigma code in world war 2. William Friedman

H1.text: who cracked the enigma code in world war 2. Frank Wilcox

H2.text: who cracked the enigma code in world war 2. Hugh Alexander

H3.text: who cracked the enigma code in world war 2. Turing

A4.text: Turing devised techniques for speeding the breaking of German ciphers, including improvements to the pre-war Polish bomba method

A5.text: Turing's approach was more general, using crib-based decryption for which he produced the functional specification of the bombe
